divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and I were traveling in our car and it was such a beautiful day without a cloud in the sky...the sun was so bright that we wasn't trying to look at the sky at all and i was even contemplating putting on my shades to block the sun. Fortunate for me, i looked up and noticed that a plane coming from the west was flying extremely high but, what captivated my attention was that a star seemed like it was inside our atmosphere and even as low as a cloud would appear..so i asked my wife, "do you see that"...so she starting noticing the same thing that i was, and was super amazed at the glowing object that looked like it was a diamond shaped chrome object that was shining so bright as if it had its own light illuminating from itself that it was amazing! We watched for at least 2 mins and my wife decided to get out her camera phone and as she was about to record it, it disappeared as if it teleported or something...simply amazing! I'm definetely a firm believer that other beings exist outside of this world...and the technology they have is simply unbelievable to our kind that it baffled us that we actually seen this!
